content.txt1: Lo msebenzi unokwenza imisebenzi efana nokusebenza komntu okwenyani kubandakanya, kodwa kungaphelelanga ekucofeni, usetyenziso lwe-iPipt njl. Ngenxa yokuba kukho imingcipheko yokusebenza erekhodiweyo, esenza intlawulo, njl njl.
content.txt2: Ungawuvala njani lo msebenzi: Vula iphepha lekhaya lesi sicelo, ungayeka ukusebenzisa umsebenzi we-auxilin kwiphepha lemidlalo, okanye ungacofa yonke imisebenzi kwiphepha lasekhaya. Eli qhosha linyanzela ukuvalwa kwayo yonke imisebenzi eyenziweyo kwaye inyanzelwe ukuba ivale le app.
content.txt3: Isizathu sokuba sisebenzise lo msebenzi kukuba isicelo sethu kufuneka sikwazi ukuvula ezinye izicelo kwaye sibalawule, sinokuyityibilika i-Instagram, thumela imiyalezo kwi-Intanethi yabahlobo abakwi-Intanethi okanye ngokugcina imisebenzi.
content.title: Ukusebenza kwengozi
